_comment: Vibration threshold configuration for CNC monitor

_threshold_descriptions.warning: Yellow LED, log warning event, consider checking setup
_threshold_descriptions.critical: Red LED, reduce feed rate recommended, check for issues
_threshold_descriptions.emergency: E-STOP triggered, immediate machine halt for safety
_threshold_descriptions.hysteresis: Amount to drop below threshold before clearing status

light_machining.description: Soft materials, low DOC, finishing passes

high_speed.description: High RPM operations, engraving, PCB milling

_notes: These are starting values - calibrate for YOUR specific machine
Run test patterns without workpiece first
Monitor logs and adjust thresholds based on actual vibration levels
Emergency threshold should be ~2-3x your normal operating vibration
Start conservative, lower thresholds as you gain confidence
Different materials and cutting conditions may need different profiles
